text: Zeil am Main is a town in Haßberge in Lower Franconia, in Bavaria, Germany. It is on the right bank of the Main, 7 km east of Haßfurt, 24 km northwest of Bamberg, and 25 km east of Schweinfurt. ==Gallery== image:Krum.jpg|District Krum image:Bischofsheim Zeil W.jpg|District Bischofsheim image:Zeiler Käpelle.JPG |The hill church "Zeiler Käpelle", image:Zeil am Main Unterfranken Stadtmauer.png |Medieval walls and in the background the Propstenhof ==References== Category:Haßberge (district)
title: Zeil am Main
